entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generic constraints should prune out candidates for method group natural type #69222
    17.8
  • EnC: Renaming a property with initializer doesn't work as expected #69216
  • Only Left and returnValue gets checked for dynamic in signature #69215
  • Scoped keyword emitted by SyntaxGenerator for out parameters #69213
  • EndToEndTests.LongInitializers often times out on linux #69210
    17.8
  • It looks like ```RetargetedExplicitImplementationComparer``` uses wrong mode to compare ref kinds. #69208
  • XML documentation ignored when generated by an external tool #69204
  • Better documentation for SourceReferenceResolver #69201
  • EnC: Changing signature of an async method or an iterator does not work #69199

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33925.355 #69223
  • [Proposal]: breaking point for C# Primary Constructor #67796
  • IDE0200 is too aggressive #69209

PullRequests

Created

  • Check only once if csc.exe as filename #69221
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Only use scoped for ref parameters #69220
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: not ready for review. #69219
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only Left and returnValue gets checked for dynamic in signature #69214
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Ensure proper definite assignment analysis for an inline array that is not supported by language. #69212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Collection expressions: rename files #69207
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP #69206
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix `ref readonly` mismatch retargeting #69205
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters

Merged

  • Source generators/track values etw #68830
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Skip LongInitializerList on Linux for now #69211
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Don't compare item2 with itself but with item1 #69217
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Localize C# Interactive window title #69066
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary calls to `Contains` for sets #69179
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Disable local deploy of the arm64 ServiceHub project #69200
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use variable group for apiscan #69191
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove newly documented rules from list #69145
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update PublishData.json for 17.8 P1 snap #69198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Require `SizeConst` for `UnmanagedType.ByValArray` #68992
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Find compatible substituted implicit extensions #68989
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Another way to correct generate Uri for new Document when resolve code action #68995
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update cancellation token handling behavior for certain analyzer APIs #69108
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Results of using 'use collection expressions' #69189
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initial support for a set of analyzers/fixers to update existing code to use collection expressions. #69118
    Area-Analyzers, Story, untriaged
  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 (#67875) #69065
  • Relax method conversions with ref readonly parameters #69020
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Use consistent failure mode for inline arrays that have unsupported element fields due to different reasons. #69190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` parameters in `cref` #69104
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Update Concord dependency versions and fix nullability warnings #69195
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add more `ref readonly` tests and address comments #69183
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Remove mocks of setting services for unit tests #69160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
